tool_description: Analyzes and selects the most appropriate comparable properties based on similarity criteria, location proximity, and sale recency.

subject_property_id.description: Property ID of the subject property being appraised

candidate_property_ids.description: Array of potential comparable property IDs

max_comparables.description: Maximum number of comparables to select

max_age_months.description: Maximum age of sales in months

error_messages: Invalid subject property: subject_property_id must be a valid property identifier.
Insufficient candidates: candidate_property_ids must contain at least 3 properties.
Invalid parameters: max_comparables must be 1-20, max_age_months must be 1-60.
No suitable comparables: No properties meet the similarity and recency criteria.
usage: Provide subject_property_id and candidate_property_ids from previous searches. Optionally set max_comparables and max_age_months. Returns the best comparable properties ranked by similarity.

selected_property_ids.description: Array of selected comparable property IDs

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each selected comparable (0-1)

selection_reasons.description: Reasons why each comparable was selected
